Q4 𓊫 ϣϣⲟⲧ š'šot 𓍿𓊃𓍞𓊫 cushion < c'shot шъхьатэ ŝḥātă шъхьантэ ŝḥāntă @ chaisse=chair

𓊫 cushion cuscino cojín Kissen kudde مِخَدَّة mi.ḵadda koddi קישן කොට්ටයක් koṭṭayak cod јастык castıq частық coixí ᐊᑭᓯᖅ akisiq частых çastıx

𓍿𓊃𓍞𓊫 cushion ⇔ crescend head-rest rest raise

𐦈 PAD 𓊪 pillowed :pult pilwe pulvīnus balguh Balg balîf বালিছ balis bolish ბალიში بالش bâleš bališi polštář bolster Polster plumac :plumes баз baz padi pad pute putuskaq pagalvis բարձ barj burko :park párna pernă perină pera пе́рница pérnica bantal προσκέφαλο proskéfalo pro-cephalo hovedpude (head-pad) 베개 begae :bag :bear :port ⇔ support προσκέφαλο proskéfalo pro-cephalo cabezal cervīcal

𓍿 𓊃 𓍞 𓂻 𓏏 𓂻 𓏥||undertake journeys|ziehen:
𓍿 𓊃 𓍞 𓊫 𓂡||raise, lift up|
𓍿 𓊃 𓍞 𓏜||marshal (troops), levy (troops)|⋍zusamm

Other roots for pillow:
𓄛𓄜 дэр der (pelt⇔pillow⇔Fell polster) ger ser सिरानी sirānī
𓇹 mon 'mount' мендәр (mendär) миндар (mindar) หมอน (th) (mɔ̌ɔn) unan ໝອນ (lo) (mǭn)
𓊫 gar ⋍ 𓇹 গাৰু garu ⇔ 𐌲𐌰𐍂𐌴𐌹𐍃 כָּרִית karít 𐍅𐌰𐌲𐌲𐌰𐍂𐌴𐌹𐍃 "Wangen-rise/Wagen-Reise"? 枕 まくら　makura cervīcal gối?

𓍿 𓊃 𓌙 तकिया takiyā Decke تکیه tekye 'Träger'

Xeno:

ちん (chin) guanciale
